verses.verse: To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> he that <S%G2902>holds<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> in his <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4043>walks<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> candlesticks; <S%G3087><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> and your <S%G2873>labor,<s%> and your <S%G5281>patience,<s%> and <S%G3754>how<s%> you <S%G1410>can<s%> not <S%G941>bear<s%> them which are <S%G2556>evil:<s%> and you have <S%G3985>tried<s%> them which <S%G5335>say<s%> they are <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and are not, and have <S%G2147>found<s%> them liars: <S%G5571><s%>
And have <S%G941>borne,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> and for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake have <S%G2872>labored,<s%> and have not fainted. <S%G2577><s%>
<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> somewhat <S%G2596>against<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G863>left<s%> your <S%G4413>first<s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G1601>fallen,<s%> and <S%G3340>repent,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2041>works;<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G1490>else<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and will <S%G2795>remove<s%> your <S%G3087>candlestick<s%> out of his <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> you repent. <S%G3340><s%>
But <S%G5124>this<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> that you <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitanes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> hate. <S%G3404><s%>

He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches;<s%> To him that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> of the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G3857>paradise<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4668>Smyrna<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> and the <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and is alive; <S%G2198><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> and <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> and <S%G4432>poverty,<s%> (but you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4145>rich)<s%> and I know the <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> of them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> they are <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and are not, but are the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

<S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3367>none<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> you shall <S%G3958>suffer:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> shall cast <S%G906><s%> some of you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> that you may be <S%G3985>tried;<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days:<s%> be you <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches;<s%> He that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> shall not be <S%G91>hurt<s%> of the <S%G1208>second<s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4010>Pergamos<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> he which <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%> with <S%G1366>two<s%> edges; <S%G1366><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> and <S%G4226>where<s%> you dwell, <S%G2730><s%> even <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan's<s%> seat <S%G2362><s%> is : and you <S%G2902>hold<s%> fast my <S%G3686>name,<s%> and have not <S%G720>denied<s%> my <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> in <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> was my <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>martyr,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> you, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> dwells. <S%G2730><s%>

But I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> things <S%G2596>against<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> them that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G904>Balac<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> a stumbling <S%G4625>block<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things <S%G1494>sacrificed<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> and to <S%G4203>commit<s%> fornication. <S%G4203><s%>
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> them that <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitanes,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thing I hate. <S%G3404><s%>

<S%G3340>Repent;<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G1490>else<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and will <S%G4170>fight<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> them with the <S%G4501>sword<s%> of my mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches;<s%> To him that <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> of the <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G3131>manna,<s%> and will <S%G1325>give<s%> him a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5586>stone,<s%> and in the <S%G5586>stone<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G1508>saving<s%> he that receives <S%G2983><s%> it.

And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> <S%G1125>write;<s%> <S%G3592>These<s%> things <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> to a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and his feet <S%G4228><s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> fine brass; <S%G5474><s%>

I <S%G1492>know<s%> your <S%G2041>works,<s%> and <S%G26>charity,<s%> and <S%G1248>service,<s%> and <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and your <S%G5281>patience,<s%> and your <S%G2041>works;<s%> and the last <S%G2078><s%> to be <S%G4119>more<s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

<S%G235>Notwithstanding<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> things <S%G2596>against<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1439>suffer<s%> that <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2403>Jezebel,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>calls<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess,<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> and to <S%G4105>seduce<s%> my <S%G1401>servants<s%> to <S%G4203>commit<s%> <S%G4203>fornication,<s%> and to <S%G5315>eat<s%> things <S%G1494>sacrificed<s%> to idols. <S%G1494><s%>
And I <S%G1325>gave<s%> her <S%G5550>space<s%> to <S%G3340>repent<s%> of her <S%G4202>fornication;<s%> and she <S%G3340>repented<s%> not.

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I will <S%G906>cast<s%> her <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2825>bed,<s%> and them that <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery<s%> with her <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> they <S%G3340>repent<s%> of their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And I will <S%G615>kill<s%> her <S%G5043>children<s%> with <S%G2288>death;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> shall <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> he <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2045>searches<s%> the <S%G3510>reins<s%> and <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

But to you I <S%G3004>say,<s%> and to the <S%G3062>rest<s%> in <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine,<s%> and <S%G3748>which<s%> have not <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G899>depths<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> as they <S%G3004>speak;<s%> I will <S%G906>put<s%> on you <S%G3367>none<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> burden. <S%G922><s%>
But that which you have <S%G2192><s%> already <S%G2902>hold<s%> fast <S%G891>till<s%> I come. <S%G2240><s%>

And he that <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> my <S%G2041>works<s%> to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> to him will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the nations: <S%G1484><s%>

And he shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> them with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron;<s%> as the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of a <S%G2764>potter<s%> shall they be <S%G4937>broken<s%> to <S%G4937>shivers:<s%> <S%G2504>even<s%> as I <S%G2983>received<s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
And I will <S%G1325>give<s%> him the <S%G4407>morning<s%> star. <S%G792><s%>
He that <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the churches. <S%G1577><s%>
